numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that there is more diversity among players than among coaches.
2. Many sports have at least twice as many players of color as coaches of color.
4. I noticed that MLB has fewer players of color than other sports.
5. I wonder why companies and sports corporations do not give more coaching jobs to people of color.
6. Many players in sports are people of color.
7. I think that a coach of color may work better with players of color.
8. I wonder why there is a lack of diversity in MLB.
9. The diversity in MLB seems low compared to the diversity in other sports.
10. These statistics show facts about professional sports careers as a player and as a coach.
11. These statistics make me think that it is harder to be good at basketball if a person is white than if a person is a person of color.
12. Seeing these statistics may cause other people to try to reduce the lack of diversity in coaching roles.
13. Seeing these statistics may cause other people to try to reduce the lack of diversity in leadership roles.
14. I thought that many sports organizations say that they try to increase diversity.
15. These statistics show that many sports organizations do not increase diversity in leadership roles.
16. The title is: Lack of diversity for leadership roles.
19. I could not fit all text in the allotted space.
